content: QTR/EAP/DPTP provides reduced tuition for eligible active or officially retired employees, spouses, and qualified dependents. Application is required each semester. Cannot be combined with UA Online Percent Awards, GA Tuition Remission, or Tuition Assistance (TA). Students may choose only one discount per semester.

Applications and all fees must be processed by the Tuition Payment Deadline to avoid late charges. Fall/Spring: last day to submit is the 35th day of the semester. Summer: last day to submit is the last day for refunds for Summer Session 1.

If QTR has not posted: verify all forms are submitted to HR; subtract the expected QTR amount and pay the remaining balance by the Tuition Payment Deadline; check UAccess account activity to confirm QTR applied. QTR does not cover fees/charges such as Excess Units Surcharge or Late Charges. See Cost of Tuition & Fees for rate details.
